sentences.english: The only oasis of life was in the highlands of Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 生命的唯一绿洲在埃塞俄比亚高原。

sentences.english: Oasis is an optimum geographic section for multi-life-forms to live and propagate together in the desert region.
sentences.chinese: 绿洲是荒漠区适宜多种生物共同生息繁衍的地域。

sentences.english: The floral arrangement oasis is the base where your flowers are anchored.
sentences.chinese: 绿洲的插花是在你的花锚定基。

sentences.english: Make your personal space an oasis of calm and taste.
sentences.chinese: 让你的个人空间成为宁静和品位的绿洲。

sentences.english: Well, we've managed to avoid the armadillos and now we're at The Oasis.
sentences.chinese: 好了，我们已经设法避开犰狳，到了绿洲餐馆了。

sentences.english: What the town did have was a river, feeding an oasis in the Atacama desert.
sentences.chinese: 小镇曾有条河，流入阿塔卡马沙漠一处绿洲。

sentences.english: Cool summer nights are more than just a heaven-sent oasis from the scorching day.
sentences.chinese: 凉爽的夏夜不但是来自炙热白天天赐的绿洲。

sentences.english: Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 信仰是心灵的绿洲，思想的驼队永远无法抵达。

sentences.english: The village of Bardai is an oasis in the heart of the Sahara Desert.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔达伊村庄是撒哈拉沙漠中心地带的一个绿洲。

sentences.english: Wind erosion and its control mechanism of oasis farmland.
sentences.chinese: 绿洲农田土壤风蚀及其控制机理。

sentences.english: An oasis of rest and business in a bustling city.
sentences.chinese: 是繁华都市中休闲与商业的绿洲。

sentences.english: Ann in-depth look at the life and music of Manchester-based rock band, Oasis.
sentences.chinese: 深入研究曼彻斯特的生活和音乐摇滚乐队，绿洲。

sentences.english: Agricultural concentrated in the ferrari auspicious oasis, main planting dates.
sentences.chinese: 农业集中在法拉吉绿洲，主要种植椰枣。

sentences.english: Most live in capital WuMGaiWan and ferrari auspicious oasis.
sentences.chinese: 绝大部分居住在首府乌姆盖万和法拉吉绿洲。

sentences.english: Lonely, home is dark, the big dipper oasis in the desert.
sentences.chinese: 孤独时，家是黑夜里的北斗，是沙漠中的绿洲。

sentences.english: The oasis was alive, yet everything was still.
sentences.chinese: 绿洲生机勃勃，然而万籁俱寂。

definition: Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
